title: Blade Ball MultiScript OMG Hub AutoFarm (Mobile)
text:
I present you a multifunctional GUI "OMG Hub" for the mobile online game Blade Ball (Roblox) in which you can find all the current and working scripts. For example, there is Auto Spin Wheel, Auto Tp To Ball, Auto Vote, Auto BattlePass and many other functions, which you can run yourself through a convenient menu and the script will automatically enable the AutoFarm function.
OMG Hub in Blade Ball has proven to be one of the best scripts on BB, all the functionality is working today, I personally ran it in the new 2024, everything works perfectly!
How to use Roblox Scripts?
creator: OMG Hub
